sentences.en: Carelessly, I knocked my teacup over and the tea went all over the tablecloth.
sentences.cn: 我不小心把茶杯打翻了,洒得桌布上一塌糊涂.

sentences.en: Dinner is ready. Spread the tablecloth!
sentences.cn: 饭好了, 请铺上桌布!

sentences.en: Give the tablecloth a good shake before putting it away.
sentences.cn: 桌布收起来之前要好好抖一抖.

sentences.en: He sat there ruminating and picking at the tablecloth.
sentences.cn: 他坐在那儿沉思,轻轻地抚弄着桌布.

sentences.en: She dribbled salt all over the tablecloth.
sentences.cn: 她把台布上撒得到处是盐。

sentences.en: She smoothed down a wrinkled tablecloth.
sentences.cn: 她把起皱的桌布熨平了.

sentences.en: Spread the tablecloth and set the table for dinner.
sentences.cn: 铺上桌布摆好餐具准备开饭.

sentences.en: The hot iron scorched the tablecloth.
The Rat let his egg - spoon fall on the tablecloth, and sat open - mouthed.
sentences.cn: 老鼠手里的蛋勺滑到桌布上, 目瞪口呆地坐着.

sentences.en: There's a nasty mark on the tablecloth, and I don't think the usual washing powder will take it out.
sentences.cn: 桌布上有一块污迹, 我想用普通洗衣粉是洗不掉的.

sentences.en: There's a spot of ketchup on the tablecloth.
sentences.cn: 桌布上有一点番茄酱的渍斑.

sentences.en: Wash the tablecloth in fairly hot soapy water.
sentences.cn: 桌布要用比较热的肥皂水来洗.

sentences.en: You can tell how nervous she is by the way her fingers worry at the edge of the tablecloth.
sentences.cn: 看她那用手指拽台布边的样子,你可以断定她是多么紧张.

sentences.en: You have spilled gravy on the tablecloth.
sentences.cn: 你把肉汁泼到台布上了.

trans.tran_en: a cloth used for covering a table
